CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: This work demonstrates that the newly designed DTPD moiety is a promising building block for high performance PSCs .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| DTPD moiety |
| PSCs (assuming PSCs stands for "perovskite solar cells") |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: This work demonstrates that the newly designed DTPD moiety is a promising building block for high performance PSCs .

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| DTPD moiety |
| high performance |

The "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are "DTPD moiety" and "high performance". These entities are mentioned as properties of the newly designed building block for perovskite solar cells (PSCs).

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| high performance |

After reviewing the paragraph, the only clear "Property Name" entity that refers to a material property is "high performance". The "DTPD moiety" is not a material property, but rather a building block or material component. Therefore, it has been removed from the list.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: This work demonstrates that the newly designed DTPD moiety is a promising building block for high performance PSCs .

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| high performance PSCs |
| newly designed DTPD moiety |

The two property value entities identified from the paragraph are "high performance PSCs" and "newly designed DTPD moiety". These entities are mentioned as promising and a building block, respectively, in the original paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| high performance |

After re-evaluating the entities, I found that only "high performance" can be considered as a value of material property. The other entity, "newly designed DTPD moiety", is a material or a building block, but it does not explicitly refer to a value of material property.
